thread.title: Live score, updates: UMass football looks for homecoming win vs. Kent State
thread.title_full: Live score, updates: UMass football looks for homecoming win vs. Kent State

author: Daniel Malone | Special to MassLive
title: Live score, updates: UMass football looks for homecoming win vs. Kent State
text:
Comments 
AMHERST â€“ Greetings from McGuirk Stadium! 
What a beautiful fall afternoon in Western Massachusetts for some homecoming football. The weather outlook in Amherst right now is 50 and sunny with just enough of a breeze to remind fans that we're mid-way through October. 
UMass, looking to bounce back from its bad loss to Bowling Green last week, is hoping to remind fans that their team can still win a few games here. 
Kickoff is set for 3:30 p.m. There's no traditional television option this week, so I'm hoping many of you will decide to join us right here for all the action. 
Below, you can follow along with our updating live blog as we take you through the afternoon with my real-time Twitter updates that will appear in the comment section below. 
Be sure to join in on the discussion! Pregame Here are today's game day notes and the matchup preview . The game will be broadcast online via ESPN3/WatchESPN. Can the Minutemen beat the Golden Flashes? Go vote in our game day poll! Here's everything else you need to read to be ready to go before kickoff. 
Follow MassLive.com UMass beat writer @Daniel_Malone on Twitter or reach him via email .
